Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.7 Pañhāvāra » 9.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 9.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhārādi
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhārādi
91.
1015Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) kabaḷīkāro…  satta pañhā…  indriyapaccayena paccayo…  cakkhundriyañca…pe…  rūpajīvitindriyañca…pe…  satta pañhā jhānapaccayena paccayo…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
<< Vipākaup Vippayutta >>
